AnalyzeDocument.name: AnalyzeDocument
AnalyzeDocument.description: Detects instances of real-world document entities within an image provided as input.

GetDocumentAnalysis.name: GetDocumentAnalysis
GetDocumentAnalysis.description: Returns information about a document analysis job.

GetDocumentTextDetection.name: GetDocumentTextDetection
GetDocumentTextDetection.description: Returns information about a document text detection job.

StartDocumentAnalysis.name: StartDocumentAnalysis
StartDocumentAnalysis.description:
Starts an asynchronous job to detect instances of real-world document entities within
                                                an image or pdf provided as input.

StartDocumentTextDetection.name: StartDocumentTextDetection
StartDocumentTextDetection.description: Starts an asynchronous job to detect text in document images or pdfs.
